title: Managing household budget on entry-level income
description: Managing household budget on entry-level income
content:
Scenario: Managing household budget on entry-level income
    Given Aisha's income is $38,000 annually
    And rent consumes a large portion of her budget
    When Aisha allocates household resources
    Then the personal_agent should help optimize spending
    And it should identify where to invest versus economize
    And it should suggest cost-saving strategies appropriate to her situation
    And budget tools should account for her income constraints
    And the system should help her achieve sustainability within limits
